message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,500. I believe it will be highly valuable to you, and this offer reflects a fair price for both of us.
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $11,000 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value to me is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $11,250?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $11,000 for the product.
